item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-10-21
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• From @upgradereality - Be True to Yourself – Tyler Durden Style - This is your life and it’s ending one minute at a time #
  • Hey Comcast, is there a reason I can't get to google.com. Your business internet service = the suck. #
  • "The greatest trick the devil ever pulled was convincing the world he did not exist." #
  • RT: Motorola Droid Looks Set to Kill Us All [Pics] - (via @mashable) #

Powered by Twitter Tools
